mapper.update: update t_sys_dict set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descript = #{descript,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, `name`, descript, is_valid, create_time, creator_id, creator, is_del from t_sys_dict
